mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_BOOK ( ORDER_TRADE_NUM, ORDER_TRANS_NUM, ORDER_RECEIVE_NAME, ORDER_RECEIVE_ZIPCODE, ORDER_RECEIVE_ADDR1, ORDER_RECEIVE_ADDR2, ORDER_RECEIVE_MOBILE, ORDER_RECEIVE_PHONE, ORDER_RECEIVE_MEMO, ORDER_RECEIVE_MONEYSUM, ORDER_TRADE_PAYER, ORDER_REGDATE, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_BANK_NAME, ORDER_BANK_NUM ) VALUES ( #{order_trade_num}, #{order_trans_num}, #{order_receive_name}, #{order_receive_zipcode}, #{order_receive_addr1}, #{order_receive_addr2}, #{order_receive_mobile}, #{order_receive_phone}, #{order_receive_memo}, #{order_receive_moneysum}, #{order_trade_payer}, sysdate, #{member_id}, #{order_bank_name}, #{order_bank_num} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL( ORDER_TRADE_NUM, BOOK_NUM, ORDER_BOOK_NAME, ORDER_BOOK_PRICE, ORDER_BOOK_COUNT ) VALUES ( #{order_trade_num}, #{book_num}, #{order_book_name}, #{order_book_price}, #{order_book_count} )
mapper.select: SELECT go.*, me.member_phone, me.member_email, tb.book_image, tb.book_num, od.* FROM order_book go JOIN member me ON go.member_id = me.member_id JOIN order_detail od ON od.order_trade_num = go.order_trade_num JOIN book tb ON tb.book_num = od.book_num WHERE go.order_trade_num = #{order_trade_num}
select * from ORDER_BOOK where member_id = #{member_id} AND ORDER_USE_YN = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET BOOK_CURRENT_COUNT = #{book_current_count}, BOOK_SELL_COUNT = #{book_sell_count} WHERE BOOK_NUM = #{book_num}
UPDATE ORDER_BOOK SET ORDER_USE_YN = 0 WHERE ORDER_TRADE_NUM = #{order_trade_num}
